title: Gravelord Azir is actually Part Classic Azir on death visual bug

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Basically: Gravelord Azir died to our Classic Azir and this happened.

replies.body:
Hiya BLOODYEYES109! 

I believe we talked about this issue on Twitter over the weekend. ^-^ Thanks for reporting this on the boards with an image. I was able to repro this myself this morning. We'll see what's going on here!
